content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are multiple ways to contact support and create request. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Support Portal by selecting the specific Catalog item. It’s a preferrable option that guarantees user that request will be categorized correctly and will get to the proper workgroup for processing. It can be done via Main menu, search by key words or via Service Request Catalog. Please review the information about Service Request Catalog and Catalog items here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/dJugFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/dJugFg \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Support Portal by submitting a quick request - if you are not able to find the proper item from the service request catalog, or you cannot categorize your request\\n\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rVia email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or other emails integrated with Support Portal. (e.g., \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskLearn@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskLearn@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:support_access@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support_access@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", etc.) Such emails are automatically registered in Support Portal and can be either manually categorized by SD Contact Center team or automatically assigned to the proper support group.\\n\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAutomatically created request from another system or service. Requests are not necessarily initiated by people manually, they can be also automatically created from another system based on certain trigger or event (New profile requests from\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" upsa.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; Customer representative accounts from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://projects.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"projects.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" etc.)\\n\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn-app Help widget (aka Global Ask). In most of EPAM applications it’s possible to create request or report an issue directly from this application. Such requests are also registered in Support Portal and further processed by dedicated support groups: More information is available here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/8eBPWg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Help widget\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your mentor to submit a request together using the corresponding catalog item. Please pay attention to the mandatory and optional fields. Pay attention to Location and Approvers section\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
